ensureNotNull

public static <T> T ensureNotNull(T o1)
                       throws NullPointerException
Throws a NullPointerException if the provided argument is null. This method returns a reference to its single parameter so that it can be easily used in constructors.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of o1.
Parameters:
o1 - The object to test.
Returns:
A reference to o1.
Throws:

ensureTrue

public static void ensureTrue(boolean condition,
                              String message)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the provided condition is false.

Parameters:
condition - The condition, which must be true to avoid an exception.
